Innovation.title:
INNOVATION, INSPIRATION
& CREATIVITY
COME TO LIFE
Innovation.content:
Welcome to Bangkok’s one and only
Workstyles Office Community. Located in the
heart of the iconic Ratchaprasong District,
come WORK-LIVE-PLAY-GROW with us in
an inspired working environment that sparks
your potential to create and succeed
in all that you do!

Ourstory.title: OUR STORY
Ourstory.content:
The Gaysorn Workstyles Office Community
is made up of 3 different Office Builings
that offer world-class office spaces to suit
any business style, state-of-the-art amenities
and a brilliant offering of the city’s best retail,
food & beverage, entertainment and spiritual
attractions.
Come join our inspired community of
likeminded people today and
WORK-LIVE-PLAY-GROW with us!

OFFICECOMMUNITY.content-tower:
Thailand’s No. 1 address for premier offices in
the heart of the city, the Gaysorn Tower is an
award winning, eco-friendly and well-designed
Grade A office tower that’s built to enhance
and support your company’s success.
OFFICECOMMUNITY.content-center:
At the centre of it all, the Gaysorn Centre
is an icon and trend setting address that
fosters design, creativity and inspiration.
I t’s best known as the hub of fashion for
retail brands and multinational companies
in Bangkok.
OFFICECOMMUNITY.content-amarin:
The heritage icon that stands tall amongst
modernity, Gaysorn Amarin is the next
chapter in the personification of rebirth
and rejuvenation in the Ratchaprasong
District. With its newly renovated office
tower, join the Gaysorn Village today.

LOCATION1.content:
Set in the iconic Ratchaprason District and a stone’s throw away from the BTS Siam
and BTS Chitlom stations, the Gaysorn Village is easily accessible by public transportation
and by car. Safe and convenient, explore all 3 buildings to experience theGaysorn Workstyles
Office Community at its best today!

GaysornTower.Tower:
Gaysorn tower is bangkok’s most prestigious office tower. Gaysorn tower,
offers grade a office space with award Winning for best office development
from asia property Awards 2018-2019 and is the perfect setting is perfect toEnjoy
a com-munity of likeminded international and domestic Organizations for inspired
working environments, collaborations and success stories in the gaysorn tower
“Work, live, play, grow” way.

GaysornCenter.Center:
The epicenter of fashion forward styles and trends have been located in this area
for decades and it is not wonder why major players in the world of style,
fashion and entertainment still flock to our iconic gaysorn centre offices.
Known for the cool and contemporary vibes along with the premier location,
The straight-forward office spaces make subtle statements that resonate
across the city and beyond. Come set up where it all began and utilize the strategic
Location as the finger on the pulse of bangkok’s latest trends.

GaysornAmarin.Amarin:
Move up to amarin office tower, bangkok’s most iconic heritage office
space in the city. Fully renovated, enjoy 22 storeys of spacious floorplans,
endless cityscapes and a shared gaysorn village community.
Easily Accessible with safety and convenience from bts chitlom and bts
siam stations, untap the new wave of working style in the famous
ratchaprasong district.
